name: Daedalus v1.14.2
body:
# Changes:

* Add Foreground Service Option
* Add use System DNS Option
* Optimize main service logic

name: v1.14.1
body:
# Changes:

1. Optimized App Filter

name: v1.14.0
body:
# Changes:

1. Added `App Filter` to determine whether the app should go through the VPN
1. Updated DNS Providers (add Quad 101, Cloudflare DNS, Google Public DNS)
1. Improved DNS-over-HTTPS

name: v1.13.0
body:
# Changes:

* It *should* be `1.12.2`, but I prefer `1.13.0` and happy new year!
* Bug fixes for DNS over HTTPS
* Updated Android SDK
* Updated theme

name: v1.12.1
body:
Changes:

* Bug fixes
* Add Privacy Policy

name: v1.12.0
body:
Changes:
* Updated DNS Providers
* Updated build tools to AS 3.0
* Improved translations
* Added support for more DNS standards
  * DNS over TLS ([RFC7858](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7858))
  * DNS over HTTPS ([IETF darft](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-doh-dns-over-https-11))
  * DNS over HTTPS ([Google JSON](https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/dns-over-https))
* Many bug fixes for Android O

name: v1.11.1
body:
Changes:
* Launch by quick tile won't show the MainActivity
* Updated service activation logic
* Fixed shortcut on Android 7.1+
* Updated SDK and dependencies
* __Added PdoMo DNS nodes__

name: v1.11.0
body:
Changes:
* Removed some unavailable DNS nodes and Rule Providers
* Implemented Dark Theme
* Various bug fixes

name: v1.10.2
body:
Changes:
* Improved Local Rule Resovler's response flags
* Implemented Debug output
* Updated build-in rule providers and DNS server providers
  * Added adaway source
  * Updated FUN DNS nodes
* Fixed some compile bugs

name: v1.10.1
body:
Changes:
* Add new FUN DNS nodes
* Update rule provider (googlehosts)
* Fix some bugs may cause crash on Android 4.x
* Fix Tile Quick Setting crash
* Improve memory usage

name: v1.10.0
body:
Changes:
* Add IPv6 support (including rules!)
* Add Quick settings
* Fix some bugs which cause crash
* Dynamic update rules when service activated
* Return original packet immediately when network unreachable
* Improve zh-TW
* Add log export
* New DNS server FUN DNS
* Add import external rule

name: v1.9.0
body:
Changes:
* Fixed service unexpectedly stop
* Fixed configuration save NPE when no sdcard installed
* Fixed some user interface issues
* Added CuteDNS new node
* Added configuration file existance check
* Added more DNS record types for DNS Test
* Improved DNS server storage structure

name: v1.8.0
body:
Changes:
* DNS Test result now can be copied
* Added vokins/yhosts and lankes/connector
* Implemented Logger on all Android versions
* Fixed crash when not keeping activity
* Improved Fragment structure
* Improved Strings

name: v1.7.0
body:
Changes:
* Re-designed rules management and new UI
* Improved dns server manager UI
* Implemented internal ip address redirection for better compatiblity
* Fixed setMainFragmentHandler on null
* Fixed actitivty start failed bugs
* More friendly to developers

name: v1.6.0
body:
Changes in unreleased v1.5.0:
* Updated hosts providers
* Implemented Custom DNS server
* DNS server configurations
* User interface improvement and fixes

Changes v1.5.0 -> v1.6.0
* Implemented DNS over TCP (DnsProviders)
* Implemented DNSMasq rules support
* Improved Custom DNS servers management
* Improved DNS server Test methods
* Improved local rules resolutions effiency
* Fixed known bugs in Android 4.x

name: v1.4.0
body:
Changes:
* Improved Advanced system settings
* Added support for local hosts resolution
* Added support for pan domain name resolution
* Added Open Source Licenses
* Added hosts management fragment
* Various bug fixes

name: v1.3.0
body:
Changes:
* More DNS nodes, CuteDNS! is down for regulations.
* Redesigned activities into fragments.
* New Vector Drawable
* Improved UI updates.
* Improved user interact logic.
* Improved DNS Tests.

Incoming:
* Advanced DNS settings.

name: v1.2.0
body:
Changes:
* Various memory leak bug fixes
* More DNS server nodes
* New designed navigation drawer
* More settings options and clearer summary
* Improved AboutActivity WebView

name: v1.1.0
body:
Changes:
* Project refactored with a clearer structure
* Implemented DNS query times statistic
* Improved notification when activated
* Supported more devices (Android 4.0.3)
* New Material Design icons

name: v1.0.0
body:
First release of iTXTech Daedalus.
Features:
* Through CuteDNS to break most network restrictions in China.
* Server test can let you know the server status.
* Self-adaption activities is friendly to all devices.
